reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: l like it and l dont like it
reviews.content: The earbuds are really nice. the sounds are good the bass is punchy and smooth to hear. my only issue is; its not refined to use on calls and also connectivity. the touch sensors are not really good you might be trying to adjust the buds on your hear and boom you've turned it off and also some times you might put it on pod and it doesn't turn off remains connected. But the solution is you reset it and download its app (scan the QR code on the manual)  configure the gesture settings and it will be easy to live with it. but its value for money it strikes the balance between the price and what it offers.
reviews.author: Wycliffe kimutai

reviews.title: good product
reviews.content: The item delivered is original and has massive sound ama enjoying

Features.Rich Bass and Powerful Sound: Use φ10mm dynamic speaker, the industry's leading audio codec chip technology + professional tuning, sound quality more wide sound field and shocking low frequency experience.
Features.Fast Charge: Flash connect when open lid Automatically flash power on and connect to devices when opening the box.
Features.Transparency for awaking of surroundings: Hear essential everyday sounds such as traffic while listening to your music in the background.
Features.Comfortable and Secure Fit: Compact and small size design, half in-ear wearing style. The oval shape fits more closely to the contours of the ear and is comfortable and secure to wear, both comfortably and airtight.Low latency Game headphone level super low latency to ensure  the sound and picture synchronization for all audio, video and game entertainment.
Features.BT5.3 and Stable Dual Connection technol: Stable signal, fast and stable connection, easy to listen to songs without lagging or skipping sound
